# http2讲解

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/http2-jiangjie
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/http2-jiangjie
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install http2-jiangjie
http2-jiangjie <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g http2-jiangjie
http2-jiangjie <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
